name: OUBEL
description: '''OUBEL'''{{failed verification|date=August 2022}} or Oussama Belhcen ({{langx|ar|أسامة بالحسن}}, born March 18, 1991) is a Moroccan pop and R&B singer, songwriter and producer. He started his career in 2006 and sings in Arabic, English and French. After a short career with the Moroccan urban hip hop group MafiaFlow, he has had a solo career with three albums (''Ana Wnti'' (2008), ''Ryan Belhsen'' (2010) and ''Dayman'' (2012), an EP and a number of singles. He is signed to New Lixus Entertainment label.
